headerDisplay: This plugin works with Enphase Photovoltaic system. Devices exposed to the HomeKit needs to be added manually.

name.title: Accessory name
name.description: Accessory name to be displayed in Home app

host.title: IP/Hostname
host.description: IP Address or hostname of the Enphase Envoy gateway (defaults to envoy.local). For firmware v7+, please set the IP address.

envoyFirmware7xxTokenGenerationMode.title: Envoy Credentials Mode
envoyFirmware7xxTokenGenerationMode.description: Method used login to Envoy api

envoyPasswd.title: Envoy password
envoyPasswd.description: Envoy password (only if you altered the default password)

host.description: Here set the IP/Hostname of MQTT Broker.

port.title: Port
port.description: Here set the port of MQTT Broker.

clientId.title: Client ID
clientId.description: Here optional set the Client ID of MQTT Broker.

enable.title: Enable
enable.description: This enable authorization for MQTT Broker.

user.title: User
user.description: Here set the user of MQTT Broker.

passwd.title: Password
passwd.description: Here set the password of MQTT Broker.
